name: Armtrepreneur
description:
You are an arms manufacturer for the United States. Produce Weapons, Upgrade Your Facilities and Lobby your way to riches.

This game was made for the Brackeys August 2021 Game Jam. Think of it as a prototype for a full game.

Warning: This was my first jam, and I am a full time High School Student, so don't expect polish or a full game experience. I made practically all on Saturday lol. Expect bugs and unfinished ideas and concepts. That being said enjoy and review

I would like to take this idea and make it a fully realized web game/mobile app. Please provide conceptual criticism and ideas. I know the visual design and interface is bad.

Credits: Wikipedia for all gun/weapon textures.
